title: Plank-Wood Flooring, Washer & Dryer in Home, Private Patio/Balcony
map_address: 15930 E Briarwood Cr near E Davies Dr
posting_body: Use this link for more info:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 785 Sq.

Choose from one of our spacious one-, two- or three-bedroom floorplans, each with expansive nine-foot ceilings and exceptional features including full-sized washers and dryers, expansive walk-in closets, balconies or patios, wood-style plank flooring and deep soaking tubs.
Our custom kitchens have stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, designer tile backsplash and pendant lighting.
We have everything to provide the lifestyle as exceptional as you here at Caliber at Cornerstar.
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
